title: New Update Available
message:
-Fixed Google Play Protect Message.
-Fixed Download Option.
-Renovated ExoPlayer.
-Added Subtitle Option.
-Created Telegram Group.
-Minor Bug Fixed.
important:
Dear Users 

This message is for users who receive the Google Play Protect message as an alert.
Sofa TV is a safe and free of virus, Sofa TV does not collect data from any user, and has no intention of doing any harm, I dont understand the reason for the message.
Im working on it to stay free of warnings and bugs. Stay tuned for Updates.

Thanks.
